A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was just a poor movie (all star wars inconsistencies aside). Side plots that go nowhere and have no significance to the story\, an absurd amount of weird \"jokes\" that seemed inappropriate considering the situation\, and a bunch of useless characters that felt very much like \"celebrities that wanted to be in the new star wars\, so give them a part\". Definitely not recommended and will not see again. I recommend a do-over.
